verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We are celebrating today,
the sacrifice of the living God
The divine sacrifice of Holy mass
We have come to worship
the Mighty God. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Let us dwell
in the house of God
Seek refuge
in the arms of God
His love is unending.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Lift your voices
with songs of praise
Lift up your hearts
with one accord
Let heaven
and earth praise Him.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Ni furaha tukiimba
Ndani ya nyumba ya Bwana
Aliyetuumba.
